itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, Dan Hollaway, and Jessie Wiseman discuss the realest fake news of the week including the recent string of Epstein memes, San Francisco passing a law that makes it legal to now urinate in the streets, how Puerto Rico is financially collapsing on itself, why Israel and Palestine are bombing each other again, how the parents of Sandy Hook are suing the gun manufacturer Remmington, and tv's obsession with bashing Trump.
